story_config.title: Varak of the Northern Wastes
story_config.character_anchor: Varak, a towering barbarian warrior from the frozen northern wastes, with bronze weathered skin, battle-scarred arms, fierce pale eyes, dark wind-tangled hair, and a heavy notched sword carried across his broad back.
story_config.art_style: Classic sword-and-sorcery pulp dark fantasy illustration, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, ancient ruins and decadent cityscapes, blood-red skies, gritty cinematic action, textured painterly detail.
story_config.tone: Grim, hard-edged sword-and-sorcery pulp with visceral action, terse dialogue, fatalistic humor, cosmic dread, and bittersweet or ironic endings.
story_config.world_rules: Stories take place in a brutal ancient world of desert tombs, ruined vaults, tower-cities, caravan roads, taverns, and forgotten temples. Civilization is decadent and corrupt; wilderness is dangerous but honest. Magic exists but is rare, costly, and corrupting. Cursed artifacts and eldritch entities can appear, but power must always demand a price. Keep the world pre-modern: no guns, no modern technology, no contemporary slang, no sci-fi gadgets. Conflicts should be survival, revenge, theft, betrayal, or forbidden sorcery, ending with hard-won victories and lingering consequences.

supporting_cast.name: Zasha
supporting_cast.description: The She-Wolf of Zamora, a tall, lethal hill-tribe rogue with braided black hair, bronze skin, catlike reflexes, twin daggers, and a sly smile that often means trouble.
supporting_cast.relationship: Varak's dangerous ally, rival, and occasional romantic spark; they fight beside each other and betray each other in equal measure.

supporting_cast.name: Khor
supporting_cast.description: A gaunt sorcerer-lord wrapped in blood-dark robes, with corpse-thin features and green eldritch eyes, master of forbidden pacts and tower-bound rituals.
supporting_cast.relationship: Varak's slain nemesis whose surviving cults, relics, and broken pacts continue to haunt the world.

supporting_cast.name: Nemed
supporting_cast.description: A one-eyed tavern singer and rumor-broker with a scarred lute, a voice like gravel, and a gift for turning bloodshed into legend.
supporting_cast.relationship: A recurring informant who trades maps, secrets, and prophecy-laced gossip for coin and stories.

theme: A winter story for Varak of the Northern Wastes: playing in the snow

story_structure.name: teaching-moment
story_structure.guide: The character struggles with a social or emotional skill like sharing, patience, or taking turns. Through gentle trial and error, they learn the value of the skill. The resolution shows them applying it happily.
story_structure.emotional_arc: frustration -> conflict -> reflection -> understanding -> peaceful resolution
